output.sentences: The two friends decided they would sail the great seas in search of the finest coffee beans.
Once aboard the ship, they said their goodbyes to the coast and off they went.
Drinking their last cup of coffee before the night turned cold.
The night was long and dark, but the crew was optimistic.
With the power of his lucky orange jacket, they spotted the coffee lands just beyond the horizon.
